pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear Ridge Regression with Ridge Penalty and Ridge Statistics // Linear ridge regression coefficient's estimation and testing with different ridge related measures such as MSE, R-squared etc. REFERENCES i. Hoerl and Kennard (1970) doi:10.1080/00401706.1970.10488634, ii. Halawa and El- Bassiouni (2000) doi:10.1080/00949650008812006, iii. Imdadullah, Aslam, and Saima (2017), iv. Marquardt (1970) doi:10.2307/1267205.
